THE CONTRACTOR SHALL SUPPORT THE DEVELOPMENT OF THE TRAINING SUPPORT PACKAGE (TSP) AND INTERACTIVE MULTIMEDIA INSTRUCTION (IMI) TO INCLUDE THE INSTRUCTORS AND KEY PERSONNEL TRAINING (IKPT) BY REVIEWING AND PROVIDING FEEDBACK AT KEY GOVERNMENT REVIEWS. THE CONTRACTOR SHALL CONDUCT TRAINING FOR A MAXIMUM OF SIXTEEN (16) PERSONNEL FROM THE PROJECT MANAGER CLOSE COMBAT SYSTEM (PM CCS) CONTRACTOR LOGISTICS SUPPORT (CLS) AND SOLDIERS FROM THE MANEUVER SUPPORT CENTER OF EXCELLENCE (MSCOE). THE CONTRACTOR SHALL PROVIDE TECHNICAL SUPPORT FOR THE SPECTRUM COMPLIANCE EFFORTS. THIS TASK ORDER ALSO PROVIDES FOR THE NECESSARY PROGRESS AND QUALITY REPORTING TO ENSURE PROPER PERFORMANCE.
